abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Monstrous Talons is 6.

abilities.name: The Carrion King
abilities.description: News of Ushoran's mighty deeds spreads like wildfire through the Flesh-eater ranks.
abilities.effect: While this unit has 6 noble deeds points, the effect of the 'Feeding Frenzy' ability applies to friendly Flesh-eater Courts units while they are wholly within 24" of this unit instead of 12".

abilities.name: Shroudcage Fragment
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.description: Madness pulses from the gem in Ushoran's crown, overwhelming those who draw too close.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. If the roll exceeds the target's Control characteristic, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Glimpse of Delusion
abilities.description: Ushoran pulls an enemy into his delusion, causing them to see friends as vicious monsters.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy model within 18" of this unit to be the target, pick another enemy unit within the target's combat range to be the victim, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target's melee weapons. Immediately resolve combat attacks made with that weapon against the victim.

abilities.name: Epicentre of Delusion
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:
The Royal Hunt: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by friendly Flesh-eater Courts units that target a Monster.
Crusading Army: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly Flesh-eater Courts units.
Defenders of the Realm: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly Flesh-eater Courts units while they are contesting an objective you control.
The Grand Tournament: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by other friendly Flesh-eater Courts Heroes if they charged in the same turn.
